verbs.description: [ARG1: Pro - Trump economist Stephen Moore] [V: appeared] [ARGM-LOC: on CNN] [ARGM-TMP: Monday] [ARGM-PRP: to claim that Donald Trump should be credited for falling unemployment rates] . But he lost his temper after another panelist pointed out that the economic trend was in place long before the president took office .
